title: Construction Site Safety Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic safety regulations and understanding of construction site terminology
context.additional_context: Safety leadership education using blended instructional methods (discussions, role-playing, videos), with formative assessments to verify sustained learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can identify safety hazards at construction sites and explain at least three leadership-based response strategies.
Learners can practice safety communication skills with colleagues through role-playing with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze video case studies, develop a safety leadership action plan, and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
